education.institution: Gandhi Institute of Technology And Management

experience.role: Senior Software Engineer - Cloud and DevOps Consultant
responsibilities: Designed and deployed high-availability AWS architectures, ensuring 99.9% uptime for mission-critical applications
Built and optimized CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes, enabling seamless real-time deployments and eliminating manual bottlenecks.
Automated infrastructure provisioning and configuration management with Ansible and Terraform, significantly enhancing deployment consistency and speed.
Initiated and Led a cost-optimization strategy achieving substantial savings by implementing reserved instances, right-sizing, and auto-scaling best practices.
Enforced security and compliance standards across AWS environments by managing IAM roles, security groups, and centralized logging solutions.
Simplified cloud deployments on AWS by automating processes with Terraform and CloudFormation, making it easier and faster to manage infrastructure and resources like EC2, S3, and RDS.
Architected and deployed comprehensive monitoring and alerting systems using Prometheus, Grafana, and CloudWatch, ensuring proactive incident response.

Designed a resilient and scalable cloud infrastructure on AWS with auto-scaling and load balancing strategies, ensuring system stability during high traffic periods. Validated architecture reliability using AWS Fault Injection Simulator.
Led cross-functional collaboration, driving timely and efficient delivery of cloud-based solutions across multiple projects.
Led containerization and orchestration initiatives using Docker and Kubernetes across both cloud and on-premises environments.
Successfully migrated a legacy on-premises corporate website to AWS for a multinational client, enhancing availability and reducing operational overhead.
Built a robust cloud environment tailored for a machine learning platform, ensuring high availability and performance for end-user access.
Investigated and resolved cloud service incidents through detailed root cause analysis, ensuring rapid restoration of services and ongoing reliability.
Delivered 24X7 infrastructure support, continuously monitoring system health and maintaining comprehensive documentation for deployment, configuration, and troubleshooting processes.

Engineered and led technical initiatives for automating system engineering efforts, significantly improving the reliability, scalability, and observability of global cloud infrastructure on AWS and Azure, including defining and monitoring Service Level Objectives (SLOs).

Developed and maintained robust software, tooling, and automations (Python, Bash, Ansible, Terraform) to scale global platform infrastructure, supporting rapid growth for SaaS products and ensuring high availability.
Acted as a subject matter expert for Cloud and DevOps related issues, advising internal teams on secure design patterns, data protection strategies, and identity and access management best practices.
Acted as a subject matter expert for AWS, advising internal teams on secure design patterns, data protection strategies, and identity and access management best practices.

Designed a resilient and scalable cloud infrastructure on AWS with auto-scaling and load balancing strategies, ensuring system stability during high traffic periods. Validated architecture reliability using AWS Fault Injection Simulator.
Successfully migrated a legacy on-premises corporate website to Azure, AWS, GCP for a multinational client, enhancing availability and reducing operational overhead.

Engineered and maintained DevSecOps workflows within CI/CD pipelines, integrating security scanning tools and automated testing to minimize vulnerabilities, ensure compliance, and uphold software quality.
build a cloud infra and automated the deployment of a large machine learning model in cloud with high availability and reliability and resilient to everything.
Developed and deployed scalable, cloud-native applications using the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, Node.js) and AWS services, contributing to customer-facing projects.
Automated environment provisioning and software deployments using Azure DevOps, reducing manual effort by 75% and improving deployment consistency.
Contributed to the development and maintenance of monitoring solutions using Azure Monitor, providing early warnings for system issues and participating in incident resolution.
Contributed to the deployment and management of cloud infrastructure on AWS, Azure, GCP , focusing on compute, storage, and networking for various applications.
Gained hands-on experience with Kubernetes for container orchestration, including deployment, scaling, and monitoring of containerized applications.
Automated infrastructure provisioning and configuration management using Terraform and Ansible.
Supported CI/CD processes and utilized monitoring tools like Prometheus, ELK Stack, and cloud-native solutions CloudWatch, Azure Monitor to ensure system health.
Developed automation scripts using Python and Bash to streamline operational tasks.
Optimized database queries and caching strategies, improving API response times by 40%.
Developed and deployed cloud-native applications using AWS, Node.js, and MongoDB, enhancing scalability and performance.
Build corporate internal applications as a MEAN Stack developer
Assisted in cloud-based application development, implementing serverless architectures using AWS Lambda.
Automated AWS CloudWatch alerts for proactive system monitoring and troubleshooting.
Built machine learning models and deployed models on AWS EC2 and lambda for scalable inference.
Performed data preprocessing and visualization to enhance model performance, resulting in noticeably higher prediction accuracy and reliability.

projects.name: Promptfolia
projects.description: A serverless web application deployed on Google Cloud Run that leverages Generative AI APIs to deliver contextual prompts. Built using Python (Flask), the app integrates with Google Generative AI and is fully containerized using Docker. Deployed with GitHub Actions CI/CD, with the container image pushed to GCP Artifact Registry and auto-deployed to Cloud Run. Infrastructure authenticated and managed using service account credentials.

projects.name: Multi-Cloud 3-Tier Infrastructure Deployment with Terraform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a reusable Terraform module to deploy a 3-tier architecture (web, app, and DB layers) across AWS, Azure, and GCP. It included secure networking, VM provisioning, and automated resource management for each platform.

projects.name: AskPDF - AI-Powered PDF Query System
projects.description: Built an AI-powered document querying application that allows users to ask questions from uploaded PDFs. It uses OpenAI LLMs and FAISS vector search for semantic retrieval. Deployed backend services on AWS.

projects.name: Legacy Website Cloud Migration
projects.description: Led the migration of a legacy on-prem corporate website to AWS, Azure, and GCP for a multinational client. Ensured high availability, cost optimization, and operational visibility using cloud-native services.

projects.name: CI/CD & Monitoring Platform Integration
projects.description: Created and integrated scalable CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes. Deployed real-time monitoring using Prometheus, Grafana, and Loki to ensure availability and observability.
